text: How can I change the background color of sections in my landing pages? Thanks!

Hey guys!

Seems like a newbie thing, but is there any reason why the buy button is greyed out for me on the HubSpot marketplace when I got to  purchase templates?
do you sell templates in the marketplace? I noticed that happens when I use my partner account
Nope, this is my first time visiting the marketplace, so I don't understand why I can't purchase from here lol.

do you know if you have edit user permissions? "Edit code templates & modules: toggle the switch on to grant the user the ability to edit coded templates and modules, which appear in the Coded Files folder of the design manager. Users without the Edit code templates & modules permission cannot access the template marketplace. " <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/settings/HubSpot-user-permissions-guide#marketing>
